name: RunStickmanRun
description:
During this run you have to shoot red stickmans. Shooting requires stickmans in your pocket which can be refilled by shooting blue stickmans who love to dance!

Use swipe to aim and shoot at release.

Good luck Stickman!

Meteor Team (Метеор):

Captain (Programmer): Filippenko Alexey Vadimovich

Designers: Viliamov Igor Sergeevich, Amadulaev Edward Arturovich, Kim Eduard Evgenievich

Animations were made using MixAmo.com

Music, 3D models and materials proveided by our team.
